content.text: Beer VI is the king of the Roshwan Kingdom.
Beer VI is a middle-aged man with small ears, prominent cheekbones, thick lips and thick jawline. He has a thin black mustache and a goatee that end in three points.

He wears a dark red robe with brown fur trim on the cuffs and bottom, a jaguar-printed sash, and a blue cloak with a brown border and light blue fur trim. He also wears a black ushanka with white fur that has curved horns instead of ear flaps.
Nothing is known about Beer's personality.
As king of the Roshwan Kingdom, Beer VI has control over its citizens and is able to attend the Levely.
Beer VI and his daughters arrived at the Red Port to attend the Levely at Mary Geoise. After reaching the top of the Red Line via a bondola, they made their way to the Mary Geoise castle.
The kings and queens later gathered inside the conference room to begin the Levely.
He commented on Luffy's infamy and called him daring before the Levely meeting started.
After the Levely ended, Beer VI departed Mary Geoise.

elements.text: As part of the Roshwan Kingdom's apparent Russian theme, Beer VI looks like a Russian man with Russian-style garb.
The king's name may be a reference to alcoholic drinks being particularly popular in Russia with beer being second only to vodka in popularity.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 82 Chapter 823 and Episode 777, Beer VI make his debut.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 90 Chapter 905 (p. 6) and Episode 882, Beer VI is introduced.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 90 Chapter 906 and Episode 884.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 90 Chapter 908 and Episode 889.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 90 Chapter 908 and Episode 889, page 12
